<Text: Harvey is an English family and given name derived from the Breton name "Huiarnuiu", derived from an Old Breton first name "Huiarnviu", derived from the elements "hoiarn", "huiarn" (Breton "houarn") meaning "iron" and "viu" (Breton "bev") meaning "blazing".>
